amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce Missile Defense Agency funding by $1.084 billion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 30 printed in House Report 110-151 to reduce the $8.1 billion specified for Missile Defense Agency (MDA) activities by $1.084 billion from specified programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tierney amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 299 (Roll no. 367).
